yes.u_male: Greetings, Brother.  This is a sacred place.
yes.no: Greetings, Sister.  This is a sacred place.

yes.yes: A pleasant surprise to see you working with us.  What do you require?
yes.no: You are not welcome here sanguinist.  State your intentions.

yes.yes: Welcome, Keeper.  What do you require?
yes.no: Servant of the otherworldly, you are welcome here, so long as you cause no trouble.

yes.yes: Welcome back.  What do you need?
yes.no: I can sense the touch of the otherworldly about you.  For what purpose are you here?

responses.text: [MISSION] Sofia asked that I recruit traders or other assistance at the center.  Any advice for that?
[MISSION] Sofia asked me to investigate a lead on a remnant of the Keepers.  She said you knew more about that?
So, how are things working out with the new arrivals so far?
What can you tell me about this place?
Are there any others of us left?
What other arcane groups are out there?
What can you tell me about your group?
Anything I can do to help?
Anything I can do to help?
Anything I can do to help?
responses.//: Effect reused since this is all just to patch up my mistake.

dynamic_line: I've never been to the center myself, so I'm not sure what to suggest.  More hands to help build and hunt would be nice, though I suppose a source of trade would be useful, to keep our supplies well stocked.  I'll trust you to use your discretion.

dynamic_line.yes: I tracked their movements for some time intermittently, along with keeping tabs on other leads.  No sign of person contact with the remainder of the Keepers, but they were overtly been involved in anomalous activity within the past month prior to the beginning of all this.  I will trust you to retrieve any intel as you see fit given your connection to their order, but do exercise caution.
dynamic_line.no: I tracked their movements for some time intermittently, along with keeping tabs on other leads.  No sign of person contact with the remainder of the Keepers, but they were overtly been involved in anomalous activity within the past month prior to the beginning of all this.  Keep your guard up, and deal with them as needed if they seem unlikely to cooperate.  We can't afford to let this intel slip out of our grasp.

//: Unlike Sofia, Johnathan does not trust the Old Guard if you've picked that particular resolution for Sofia's fourth mission.

dynamic_line.yes: They're hard-working, but they know more than they let on.  At least, whoever sent them.  Be careful what you say around them.  They are here for a reason, and I'm concerned that it endanger our purpose.
dynamic_line.no: I have my concerns, but they seem to be trustworthy.  Not well-versed in the arcane, but if need be we can teach them our ways.  Other than that, they seem to mostly just help with day-to-day tasks.

dynamic_line: Not at the moment, but check back another time.  I might have something for you then.
My name is Johnathan Leone.  I was among the founders of our order, as was Sofia it seems.  Before the founding, I held the title of Grandmaster among the order I was once a part of.

Indeed.  Before the founding, we were a local religious institute under solemn vow.  I suspect the Church would frown upon our present conduct, our practices now so closely entwined with our heathen brethren.
Sofia would know more of the place.  Sadly I'm not ordained to serve the role of whoever originally tended to this place, and so sacred duties fall to Thane McKinnon.
For now, I oversee the training and preparation of the others here, and organize scouting and supply runs.  Check with me and perhaps I'll have something for you do.

We are not alone out there.  I am aware of other hunting parties still hanging on, though getting a fix on their location is difficult.  I've given Sofia what information I have, she might be able to do something with it if you ask her.

//: It can be presumed that Johnathan can sense the difference between a member of the Sanguine Order and a non-Order Dragonblood, so only refers to them as sanguinists in the generic sense.

dynamic_line.yes: A few scattered signs of your order, despite our conflict almost wiping us both out.  The Keepers of the Oath seem to be just about extinct too, largely thanks to your fellows.  That just leaves various cults and handfuls of independent practitioners, as far as I'm aware.  I can only pray that they don't make things worse, with no one left to guide them.
dynamic_line.no: The Sanguine Order, as far as I've been able to discern, has been almost wiped out.  Thank the gods for that.  I've heard barely anything of the Keepers, possibly for the best given we weren't often on speaking terms with each other.  Handful of cults here and there no doubt, but I'm not aware of any others to get tangled up in the bickering and squabbling of the old days.  Likely individuals out there surely, still dabbling in potentially dangerous magic with no one to guide them.

dynamic_line: To bring justice to those who would endanger humanity, if we must.  To mend the growing wound In The Veil Between Worlds, if we can.  To guard and guide so that a dangerous path may be avoided, so we shall.  So long as the Sun shines upon the Earth.  We are hunters of the wicked and otherworldly, and protectors of the innocent.  At least, we strive to be.  There weren't that many of us, and being scattered as small parties meant that not all of us adhered to proper conduct, though it never reached the point of dissension and division.
